name: The Andromeda exspedition
description:
Are you ready to save humanity?

In this game your mission is to save HUMANITY!

It sounds easy enough but the the unexplored planets in the Andromeda galaxy

is inhabited by vile aliens. So its noy easy to find a planet humanity can live on. 

Its now up to you! Can you save humanity? 

Winner in Design for a 24 hour GameJam.

When i came home from the jam i thought that it was a good concept. So i tidied up the game(It really needed that) and made some more features. I tried not to change it too much because i wanted to keep the "GameJam" in it.
